ValidationRule.description: To Be Deleted can not be checked in certain instances
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( NOT(ISBLANK(LatestCallTime__c)), NOT(OwnerId = '00G70000001k1e3'), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'NSS_Lead_Record_Type', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Pending_Leads', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'SysAdminRecordType', NOT(ISBLANK(Bank_Lead_ID__c )), NOT(ISBLANK( SurePayroll_ID__c ))) && NOT( ISPICKVAL(Status,'Already Contacted/Duplicate')) && NOT( ISPICKVAL(Status,'Previously Sold')) && NOT( ISPICKVAL(Status,'Bad Phone')) && NOT( ISPICKVAL(Status,'Bad Lead')) && NOT( ISPICKVAL(Status,'To Be Deleted')) && ISCHANGED( To_Be_Deleted__c ) && To_Be_Deleted__c
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This Lead can not be marked for deletion.
